thread.title: A great reasonably priced hotel right in the heart of London
thread.title_full: A great reasonably priced hotel right in the heart of London - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: geoffrey g
title: A great reasonably priced hotel right in the heart of London
text:
Ideally located for the underground via Waterloo Station also the Thames walk as far as Tower Bridge.
Good rooms, bed and bedding. Well presented dining area with staff who work extremely hard to accommodate everyone's needs. Can't fault it for the price and location. A great find.
